title: Church Complaints, Joe Biden, Snoop Dogg, Minneapolis PD and more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, Joe Biden, Snoop Dogg, Minneapolis PD and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are motivational, enlightening and we are in full support of peaceful protesting. We have a Dear Black People type of letter in Something Funny. Did Pastor Motown misuse the Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem's funds? Deacon Def Jam seems to think so. Uncle Joe will express his condolences in person and meet with the Floyd family today in Houston. A group of white police officers and other community leaders came together to wash their black brothers and sisters feet in Cary, North Carolina. Snoop Dogg will finally exercise his right to vote this year. The Minneapolis Police Department will undergo some huge changes. Super Tuesday is tomorrow and 5 states will be holding elections. The United States Marine Corp has banned the public display of the confederate flag. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about protesting being a sport for the young and also talks about racism lasting longer than slavery, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are motivational, enlightening and we are in full support of peaceful protesting. We have a Dear Black People type of letter in Something Funny. Did Pastor Motown misuse the Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem's funds? Deacon Def Jam seems to think so. Uncle Joe will express his condolences in person and meet with the Floyd family today in Houston. A group of white police officers and other community leaders came together to wash their black brothers and sisters feet in Cary, North Carolina. Snoop Dogg will finally exercise his right to vote this year. The Minneapolis Police Department will undergo some huge changes. Super Tuesday is tomorrow and 5 states will be holding elections. The United States Marine Corp has banned the public display of the confederate flag. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about protesting being a sport for the young and also talks about racism lasting longer than slavery, plus more.
